name: Tenant/Landlord Counseling - Livermore Office
short_desc: Offers information on housing rights and responsibilities
description: Offers information on housing rights and responsibilities. Builds awareness of housing laws and attempts mediation to preserve housing when appropriate.Assist with the following needs:-Received a 3-Day or 30 -Day Notice.-Repair problems.-Have harassment questions or complaints.-Having problems with the property manager, or your tenants.
